item.title: CVE-2024-33562|2024-07-17T16:01:35.562Z -- 8theme -- xstore
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in 8theme XStore allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects XStore: from n/a through 9.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-33561|2024-06-10T14:04:16.850Z -- 8theme -- xstore
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in 8theme XStore.This issue affects XStore: from n/a through 9.3.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-33560|2024-06-04T17:45:09.512Z -- 8theme -- xstore
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in 8theme XStore allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects XStore: from n/a through 9.3.8.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in 8theme XStore.This issue affects XStore: from n/a through 9.3.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in 8theme XStore allows SQL Injection.This issue affects XStore: from n/a through 9.3.5.
